
                            
                            <p>5折，在叠加<a href="https://u.jd.com/HzrAkMR" target="_blank" class="infotextkey">省省卡</a>，2.4元 <br>  <br> 还可以叠加其他小红包<img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/20/072125wiua1f8s00ri0hfz.jpeg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/20/072125wiua1f8s00ri0hfz.jpeg"> <br> </p>
